derivation: probably from the same as H3196 (יַיִן); effervescing (i.e. hot and active);
outline:
Javan = "Ionia" or "Greece"
  1. a son of Japheth and grandson of Noah
  2. Greece, Ionia, Ionians
    1. location of descendants of Javan
strongs_def: Javan, the name of a son of Joktan, and of the race (Ionians, i.e. Greeks) descended from him, with their territory; also of a place in Arabia
